metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13775 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.Description:
ZNC 1.8.0 up to 1.8.1-rc1 allows authenticated users to trigger anapplication crash (with a NULL pointer dereference) if echo-message is notenabled and there is no network.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13775` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

znc - 1.8.2-2build1
znc-perl - 1.8.2-2build1
znc-python - 1.8.2-2build1
znc-tcl - 1.8.2-2build1
znc-backlog - 0.20180824+1.8.2-2build1
znc-push - 1.0.0+git20190521.78d0385+1.8.2-2build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: znc package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.1-1').
